seatplan_detail_msg_remark: - For wheelchair accessible tickets reservation, please reserve via email (enquiry@emperorcinemas.com) or hotline (2522 2996) 24 hours in advance and purchase at cinema 1 hour before show.- A maximum of 8 tickets can be purchased per transaction.- Once your seats are selected, payment must be completed in 10 minutes or it will be cancelled.- Select consecutive seats on the same row only.- Please do not bring food and drinks from outside the cinema.- Click here to see the full Terms and Conditions.

ewallet_message_nocoupon: There is no coupon for now.
ewallet_label_instruction:
To enjoy:
- Present this to service ambassador at conceirge; or
- Select this "offer" during website / mobile app/ kiosk ticketing
ewallet_msg_ticketing_coupon_tnc:
HK$20 Ticket Discount Coupon - Terms & Conditions
- This coupon is applicable for purchasing a regular-priced ticket of 2D / 3D movie or The Coronet on or before the expiry date.
- This coupon is applicable to concierge, website, mobile app and kiosk of Emperor Cinemas for ticketing.
- This coupon is not applicable to house booking, bulk purchase, non-regular priced show (i.e. including morning show, first show, Tuesday show and selected late-night show), non-regular priced ticket (i.e. including child ticket, student ticket and senior ticket), preview show, special show, designated date, designated movie and movie with special engagement with film distributor.
- One coupon can be used per ticket and a maximum of two coupons can be used per transaction.
- This coupon can be used once only; photocopies will not be accepted.
- This coupon cannot be redeemed for cash or resold or used in conjunction with any other promotion offers.
- This voucher will be invalidated if lost, stolen, defaced, altered or damaged. Invalid vouchers are non-refundable and non-replaceable- Emperor Cinemas reserves the right to amend and supplement any terms & conditions of this coupon without prior notice.
- In case of disputes, decisions of Emperor Cinemas shall be final.
ewallet_label_birthday_instruction:
To enjoy:
- Present this to service ambassador at concierge; or 
- Present this to service ambassador at VIP House after admission
ewallet_msg_birthday_coupon_tnc: One complimentary birthday concession e-coupon will be credited to each member account 30 days before member’s birthday, the coupon is valid for 30 days from credited to the e-membership account. Member can redeem the complimentary birthday concession with the coupon directly at Emperor Cinemas concession counter. If a member registered as member within 30 days before birthday, the complimentary birthday concession coupon will be credited to the account on the next day. If the member registered after his/her birthday of that year, the coupon will be credited to the account on his/her next year’s birthday.
redeem_offer_message_nochange: Redeemed item(s) cannot be changed/ cancelled after clicking “Buy Now”.

forgot_pw_msg_reset: Please follow the instruction in the Email we sent to your registered email address to reset password. You may check the junk mail box for missing email.
forgot_pw_msg_email: Hi, Joe ChanPlease click here to reset your password. Thanks!Be remind that the link for reset is only valid till XXXXXXXXXEmperor Cinemas
forgot_pw_msg_reject: Error on resetting password.1. Please ensure that you have activated your membership account by following the instruction on the confirmation email.2. If you haven’t activated your membership account via email, please do so. Or if you cannot find the confirmation email in your mailbox, please check the spam folder.3. If you have done the above and still not able to reset your password, please contact service ambassador.

reminder_message_catthree_descr: The film is classified as Category III and only available to audiences aged 18 and above. Please show valid proof of age upon request.
reminder_message_threed_descr: Feel free to bring your own 3D glasses to the show. If not, 3D glasses are available to buy at the front foyer.
reminder_message_fourd_descr: Please observe our safety guidelines for 4D films before feature presentation begins
reminder_message_free_seating_descr: This show is free seating, no fixed seat number will be assigned.
reminder_message_member_only_descr: This show is for member ticketing only.
reminder_message_long_duration_descr: Standard ticket prices will change for films with a longer duration
reminder_message_dbox_descr: Please observe our safety guidelines before the D-Box motions feature presentation begins

reminder_message_vip_treat_descr: Price is inclusive of one ticket admission, a special set meal and our upcharge experience.
